techmeme.title: An interview with Claude AI product lead Scott White on Claude Code writing 90% of its own code, MCP, coding being accessible to non-technical workers, and more (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Q&A with Matt Mullenweg on licensing deals with AI companies, putting Tumblr's backend migration to WordPress "on hold", fediverse, content moderation, and more (Nilay Patel/The Verge)
Amazon says it has deployed over 1M robots in its warehouses, its most ever and close to its human workforce, with 75% of global deliveries aided by robotics (Sebastian Herrera/Wall Street Journal)
After criticism, Sen. Blackburn backs off her own AI compromise for the tax bill, saying "we can't block states from making laws that protect their citizens" (Kate Knibbs/Wired)
Investigation: three US Treasury hacks in the past five years were due to a failure to deploy basic security measures, as DOGE cuts further weaken the agency (Bloomberg)
